Class Assignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • functions.Assignment

  • public class Assignment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an assignment that the user has to complete. It includes the userâ€™s time limit for each assignment and points possible for each assignment

    Helen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Assignment

        public Assignment(boolean isCompleted,
                  java.lang.String subject,
                  java.lang.String assignment,
                  java.lang.String duedate,
                  int time,
                  int priority)
        Creates an Assignment Object
        Parameters:
        isCompleted - Whether the assignment has been completed or not
        subject - The subject that relates to the assignment
        assignment - The name of the assignment
        duedate - The date that the assignment is due
        time - The time that the user wants to spend on each assginment
        priority - A number representing how important the assignment is, from 1(not very important) to 5 (very imortant)
